name: Michael Jordan's B-Ball 1984
description:
Michael Jordan, in the flesh, has just walked into the gym where you're shooting some hoops. 

Impress him with your skills and you might even get signed to the Chicago Bulls!  

- Hold arrow keys to lob the ball

this was made in pico-8 for the pico-1k jam

- change A and R if you want to at the tippy top of the code (press esc)

- please mind the jank
